Title: The Rebel Flesh (1)
Plot:
A solar tsunami sends the TARDIS hurtling towards a futuristic factory on Earth, where human doppelgangers are used to mine dangerous acid, as the time-travelling adventures continue.

A second wave hits and the "Gangers" separate. They can remember every second of their "original's" life and feel every emotion they've ever experienced. But are these memories stolen or have they been bequeathed? Are the Gangers merely faulty machinery that must be shut down or are they living, breathing, sentien
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Raquel Cassidy, Sarah Smart, Marshall Lancaster, Edmond Moulton, Dan Starkey, Leon Vickers, Mark Bonnar
